effect.name: TAP Sigmoid Booster
effect.description:
TAP Sigmoid Booster (LADSPA 2157)
Applies a time-invariant nonlinear amplitude transfer function to the signal.
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Pre Gain
parameter.comment: Scales the input signal before the transfer function is applied to it.

parameter.name: Post Gain
parameter.comment: Can be used to adjust the output gain of the effect.
